metadata.title: CVE-2024-11668 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versions from16.11 before 17.4.5, 17.5 before 17.5.3, and 17.6 before 17.6.1. Long-livedconnections could potentially bypass authentication controls, allowingunauthorized access to streaming results.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
